title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 1000.1 - Purpose and scope
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 1000.1 - Purpose and scope

State Regulations

The purpose of this Part is to provide for the participation
by the Department of Labor in the Council of Contracting Agencies as required
by Executive Order No. 125, dated May 22, 1989. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
1000.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
